item.title: CVE-2022-4020|2024-08-03T01:27:54.370Z -- acer -- aspire%20a315-22
item.description: Vulnerability in theÂ HQSwSmiDxe DXE driver on some consumer Acer Notebook devices may allow an attacker with elevated privileges to modify UEFI Secure Boot settings by modifying an NVRAM variable.
